item.title: Services & Capabilities
item.dc:creator: swiftpsd_pinpoint
item.content:encoded:
[vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="first"] [icon image="wrench" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

Extensive Theme Options

Boxed or Full-width layout, 99 Backgrounds to choose from, 4 Logo Placement Options, Auxiliary area for search, subscribe, languages & login. 22 Portfolio & 12 Blog variations, plus optional Mini-nav, breadcrumbs & copyright area. 8 Footer types and Social ready. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="last"] [icon image="edit" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

Swift Page Builder

Powerful, flexible and intuitive. Our Page Builder allows you to quickly & easily create simple or complex pages to your hearts content. Combine any of the 32 elements, each with it’s own customisable options to create unique pages that do your content justice. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="30px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="first"] [icon image="resize-small" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

Fully Responsive

Like any decent theme, Pinpoint is completely responsive. And when we say responsive, we mean it won’t only work on mobile & tablet devices; it’ll look good too! So you’ll never have to worry about what device your clients or customers are using. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="last"] [icon image="cogs" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

Huge Shortcode & Template Library

Pinpoint comes loaded with 19 shortcodes, with multiple types and styles… a staggering 116 in total, which can be customised further in the Colorizer. It also comes with 12 page templates, ready for you to use as is or customise to better suit your needs. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="30px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="first"] [icon image="font" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

600+ Google Fonts

Pinpoint features 600+ Google Web Fonts, all selectable from the Theme Options panel. You can select different fonts for the body, and headings, or use the standard fonts provided such as Arial and Helvetica. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="last"] [icon image="trophy" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

220 Font Awesome Icons

Font Awesome is a full pictographic desktop font containing 220 web-related vector icons, installed as standard with Pinpoint. Choose from 4 different sizes (small, medium, large & extra small), any color you want, whether or not they’re contained, and how they’re positioned. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="30px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="first"] [icon image="retweet" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

Mind-blowing Sliders

Responsive, full-width slider with loads of transition, animations and effects. Also features an image preloader, video embedding, autoplay that stops on user interaction and lots of easy to set options to create your own effects. Boom! [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="last"] [icon image="tint" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

Unlimited Colors

Pinpoint gives you unparalleled access to its color properties, a total of 46 different elements that can be customised using the Colorizer. As well as your standard options, you can also change the colour of various shortcode elements allowing you another level of customisation. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="30px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="first"] [icon image="bolt" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

Lightning Fast Framework

Pinpoint features an extremely powerful and feature packed custom framework that we have spent over a year developing. It includes the incredible Swift Page Builder, which allows you to create pages and posts with extreme control and precision, giving you the ability to create content exactly the way you want to. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="last"] [icon image="bar-chart" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

Google Charts Included

Pinpoint features Google Chart integration, allowing you to easily create charts through the Page Builder. You can provide parameters for the type of chart, colours used, and the data with ease. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="30px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="first"] [icon image="globe" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

Translation Ready

Pinpoint comes completely translation ready as standard, so that you can provide your content in as many languages as you need to. 100% WPML Compatible as standard. [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/2" el_position="last"] [icon image="search" size="large" cont="yes" float="left"]

SEO Optimised

Pinpoint has been built with the best SEO practices in mind, using semantic & valid HTML which makes it easy for search engines to index the content of your site. The code has been structured to ensure that important content has precedent, and heading tags have been used in accordance with guidelines. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="60px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: swiftpsd_pinpoint
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickies to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

Boxed or Full-width layout, 99 Backgrounds to choose from, 4 Logo Placement Options, Auxiliary area for search, subscribe, languages & login. 22 Portfolio & 12 Blog styles, plus optional Mini-nav, bread crumbs & copyright. 8 Footer types and Social ready.
[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text title="Incredible Swift Page Builder" pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3"]
Powerful, flexible and intuitive. Our Page Builder allows you to quickly & easily create simple or complex pages. Combine any of the 32 elements, each with it’s own customisable options to create unique pages that do your content justice.
[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text title="Huge Shortcode & Template Library" pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3" el_position="last"]
Pinpoint comes loaded with 19 shortcodes, with multiple types and styles… a staggering 116 in total, which can be customised further in the Colorizer. It also comes with 12 page templates, ready for you to use as is or customise to better suit your needs.

item.title: 12 Reasons To Buy
item.dc:creator: swiftpsd_pinpoint
item.content:encoded:
[vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="wrench" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]1. Extensive Theme Options

Boxed or Full-width layout, 99 Backgrounds to choose from, 4 Logo Placement Options, Auxiliary area for search, subscribe, languages & login. 22 Portfolio & 12 Blog variations, plus optional Mini-nav, breadcrumbs & copyright area. 8 Footer types and Social ready. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="edit" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]2. Swift Page Builder

Powerful, flexible and intuitive. Our Page Builder allows you to quickly & easily create simple or complex pages to your hearts content. Combine any of the 32 elements, each with it's own customisable options to create unique pages that do your content justice. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="cogs" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]3. Huge Shortcode & Template Library

Pinpoint comes loaded with 19 shortcodes, with multiple types and styles… a staggering 116 in total, which can be customised further in the Colorizer. It also comes with 12 page templates, ready for you to use as is or customise to better suit your needs. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="tint" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]4. Unlimited Colors

Pinpoint gives you unparalleled access to its color properties, a total of 46 different elements that can be customised using the Colorizer. As well as your standard options, you can also change the colour of various shortcode elements allowing you another level of customisation. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="resize-small" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]5. Fully Responsive

Like any decent theme, Pinpoint is completely responsive. And when we say responsive, we mean it won't only work on mobile & tablet devices; it'll look good too! So you'll never have to worry about what device your clients or customers are using. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="font" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]6. 600+ Google Fonts

We're huge typophiles over here at Swift towers, so we understand the need for decent web fonts. Pinpoint supports over 600 Google web fonts, in the event you don't want to use default fonts (not that there's anything wrong with Helvetica or Myriad!) [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="trophy" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]7. 220 Font Awesome Icons

Font Awesome is a full pictographic desktop font containing 220 web-related vector icons, installed as standard with Pinpoint. Choose from 4 different sizes (small, medium, large & extra small), any color you want, whether or not they're contained, and how they're positioned. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="retweet" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]8. Mind-blowing Sliders

Responsive, full-width slider with loads of transition, animations and effects. Also features an image preloader, video embedding, autoplay that stops on user interaction and lots of easy to set options to create your own effects. Boom! [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="list-ul" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]9. Page Meta Options

In addition to the numerous theme options, coloriser and Page Builder options, Pinpoint also allows even further customisation through the powerful page meta options. Especially useful for Portfolio and Blog post pages. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="globe" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]10. Translation Ready

Pinpoint comes completely translation ready as standard, so that you can provide your content in as many languages as you need to. 100% WPML Compatible as standard. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="search" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]11. SEO Optimised

Pinpoint has been developed with the best SEO practices in mind. It features semantic & valid HTML which makes it easy for search engines to index the content of your site. The theme has been structured to ensure that important content always has precedent over less important content, and heading tags have been used in accordance with guidelines. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

[icon image="bolt" size="medium" cont="yes" float="left"]12. Lightning Fast Framework

Pinpoint features an extremely powerful and feature packed custom framework that we have spent over a year developing. It includes the incredible Swift Page Builder, which allows you to create pages and posts with extreme control and precision, giving you the ability to create content exactly the way you want to. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="60px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

item.title: Translation Ready
item.dc:creator: swiftpsd_pinpoint
item.content:encoded:
[vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Pinpoint comes completely translation ready as standard, so that you can provide your content in as many languages as you need to.

We have worked with WPML to ensure that Pinpoint provides 100% compatibility, and we've even implemented an easy-access language selector into the header. This language selector is automatically populated with the languages selected by you in the WPML plugin. We have also provided the .po/.mo files for UK English, which you can then use to translate into your chosen languages. [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="14px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [divider type="dotted" text="Go to top" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="10px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_single_image image="4623" frame="noframe" full_width="no" lightbox="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="28px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [divider type="dotted" text="Go to top" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_single_image image="ype-of-5002" frame="noframe" full_width="no" lightbox="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="68px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

item.title: Fonts & Icons
item.dc:creator: swiftpsd_pinpoint
item.content:encoded:
[vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

We're huge typophiles over here at Swift towers, so we understand the need for decent web fonts. Pinpoint supports all of the Google web fonts available. Just select the one you want from the drop down in the font theme option. If for some reason the one you want is not in the list, let us know and we'll update it for you. If you would like to use a web font from somewhere else, we can help you with that too.

Of course you can still choose a default font if you wish. We're still big fans of Helvetica and Myriad! You can find out more about the colour options for your fonts here [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="17px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [divider type="dotted" text="Go to top" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Font Options

[/vc_column_text] [divider type="go_to_top_icon1" text="Go to top" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Font Awesome Icons

Font Awesome is a full pictographic desktop font of web-related actions. It features 220 vector icons that are infinitely scalable, screen reader compatible and even supported by IE7. Pinpoint comes with Font Awesome installed as standard, and it gives you the control to decide how you want them to look. Choose from 4 different sizes (small, medium, large & extra small when used as part of a link), any color you want, whether or not they're contained, and how they're positioned. Find out more about using icons in Pinpoint Visit the Font Awesome site [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="6px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [divider type="dotted" text="Go to top" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

item.title: Page Builder Overview
item.dc:creator: swiftpsd_pinpoint
item.content:encoded:
[vc_video link="http://vimeo.com/56875225" size="940x705" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="8px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="2/3" el_position="first"]

Introduction

[dropcap1]T[/dropcap1]he Swift Page Builder has a total of 32 elements to choose from. Each of these elements has various options within them and can be arranged to create any number of layouts you might want. The Page Builder also allows you to save layouts as templates, so you can re-use them quickly and easily.

32 Elements to choose from:

[one_fourth][list type="dot"] [list_item]Portfolio Element[/list_item] [list_item]Portfolio Carousel[/list_item] [list_item]Clients Element[/list_item] [list_item]Jobs Overview[/list_item] [list_item]Jobs Element[/list_item] [list_item]F.A.Q's Element[/list_item] [list_item]Revolution Slider[/list_item] [list_item]Team Element[/list_item][/list][/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list type="dot"] [list_item]Showcase Element[/list_item] [list_item]Sitemap[/list_item] [list_item]Text Block[/list_item] [list_item]Code Snippet[/list_item] [list_item]Divider[/list_item] [list_item]Message Box[/list_item] [list_item]Single Image[/list_item] [list_item]Impact text + Button[/list_item][/list][/one_fourth] [one_fourth] [list type="dot"] [list_item]Blog Element[/list_item] [list_item]Recent Posts[/list_item] [list_item]Team Carousel[/list_item] [list_item]Tweet Bar[/list_item] [list_item]Search Element[/list_item] [list_item]Boxed Content[/list_item] [list_item]Blank Spacer[/list_item] [list_item]Toggle Element[/list_item][/list][/one_fourth] [one_fourth_last] [list type="dot"] [list_item]Tab Element[/list_item] [list_item]Testimonials[/list_item] [list_item]Accordion Element[/list_item] [list_item]Video Player[/list_item] [list_item]Google Charts[/list_item] [list_item]Google Maps[/list_item] [list_item]Raw HTML[/list_item] [list_item]Raw js[/list_item][/list][/one_fourth_last]Learn more about individual elements [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3" el_position="last"]

Create Rich Pages

Tired of the restrictive nature of standard pages? Feel like they don't do your content justice? Yeah, so are we. That's why Pinpoint allows you to create rich and beautiful pages not only for regular pages, but also for Portfolio and Blog post pages. But don't take our word for it, here are some we made earlier: [list type="article"] [list_item]Example Rich Portfolio Post Page 1[/list_item] [list_item]Example Rich Portfolio Post Page 2[/list_item] [list_item]Example Rich Portfolio Post Page 3[/list_item] [list_item]Example Rich Blog Post Page 1[/list_item] [list_item]Example Rich Blog Post Page 2[/list_item] [/list] [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="73px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

item.title: Example Demo Sites
item.dc:creator: swiftpsd_pinpoint
item.content:encoded:
[vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

Below you'll find 6 example sites we built to show you just how different Pinpoint can look.

[/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="30px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3" el_position="first"]

Example One: McNamara & Co Management Consultancy Demo

Features: [list type="pen"] [list_item]Full-width layout[/list_item] [list_item]Font: PT Sans[/list_item] [list_item]Blog: Mini[/list_item] [list_item]Multi-language[/list_item] [list_item]Light & clean[/list_item] [/list] View Demo [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3"]

Example Two: Assembly Digital Agency Demo

Features: [list type="pen"] [list_item]Boxed layout[/list_item] [list_item]Font: PT Sans & Pacifico[/list_item] [list_item]Blog: Masonry[/list_item] [list_item]Full-width logo[/list_item] [list_item]Colourful[/list_item] [/list] View Demo [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3" el_position="last"]

Example Three: Convoy Art Gallery Demo

Features: [list type="pen"] [list_item]Boxed layout[/list_item] [list_item]Font: Arial[/list_item] [list_item]Blog: Standard/Masonry mix[/list_item] [list_item]Full-width logo[/list_item] [list_item]No Copyright area[/list_item] [/list] View Demo [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="43px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [divider type="dotted" text="Go to top" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="16px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3" el_position="first"]

Example Four: The Belmont Hotel & Restaurant Demo

Features: [list type="pen"] [list_item]Full-width layout[/list_item] [list_item]Serif font: Andada/Georgia[/list_item] [list_item]Blog: Masonry[/list_item] [list_item]Centred logo[/list_item] [list_item]Minimal styling[/list_item] [/list] View Demo [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3"]

Example Five: We Are Non-profit Non-profit Demo

Features: [list type="pen"] [list_item]Background image[/list_item] [list_item]Full-width logo[/list_item] [list_item]Blog: Standard[/list_item] [list_item]Dual sidebars[/list_item] [list_item]Breadcrumbs[/list_item] [/list] View Demo [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3" el_position="last"]

Example Six: T.A. Davies Architectural Practice Demo

Features: [list type="pen"] [list_item]Full-width layout[/list_item] [list_item]Right-aligned logo[/list_item] [list_item]Dark colour scheme[/list_item] [list_item]Font: Myriad[/list_item] [list_item]Portfolio driven[/list_item] [/list] View Demo [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="73px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

item.title: Home Example 5
item.dc:creator: swiftpsd_pinpoint
item.content:encoded:
[showcase_layerslider revslider_shortcode="homesliderthin" full_width="yes" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="36px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_single_image image="4724" frame="noframe" full_width="yes" lightbox="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="40px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/4" el_position="first"]

[icon image="wrench" size="small" cont="yes" float="left"] Extensive List Of Theme Options

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/4"]

[icon image="edit" size="small" cont="yes" float="left"] Incredible Swift Page Builder

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/4"]

[icon image="cogs" size="small" cont="yes" float="left"] Huge Shortcode & Template Library

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/4" el_position="last"]

[icon image="tint" size="small" cont="yes" float="left"] Unlimited Colors For 43 Elements

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/4" el_position="first"]

Boxed or Full-width layout, 99 Backgrounds, 4 Logo Placement Options, Auxiliary area for search, subscribe, languages & login. 22 Portfolio & 12 Blog styles, plus optional Mini-nav, bread crumbs & copyright. 8 Footer types and Social ready.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/4"]

Powerful, flexible and intuitive. Our Page Builder allows you to quickly & easily create simple or complex pages. Combine any of the 32 elements, each with it’s own customisable options to create unique pages that do your content justice.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/4"]

Pinpoint comes loaded with 19 shortcodes, with multiple types and styles… a staggering 116 in total, which can be customised further in the Colorizer. It also comes with 12 page templates, ready for you to use as is or customise to better suit your needs.

[/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/4" el_position="last"]

Pinpoint features live color customisation using the WordPress customiser, allowing you to completely design a color scheme to suit the needs of your website and preview it on the fly. It’s incredible how quick and simple it is.

[/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="25px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [divider type="thin" text="Go to top" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="14px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [recent_posts title="Latest News Articles" item_count="3" category="all" excerpt_length="16" width="3/4" el_position="first"] [testimonial title="Testomonial" text_size="normal" item_count="1" order="date" category="all" pagination="no" page_link="no" width="1/4" el_position="last"] [blank_spacer height="33px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"]

item.title: Home Example 8
item.dc:creator: swiftpsd_pinpoint
item.content:encoded: [showcase_layerslider revslider_shortcode="homesliderthin" full_width="yes" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="41px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [vc_column_text title="Unlimited Colors" pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3" el_position="first"] [icon image="tint" size="medium" cont="no" float="left"]Pinpoint features live color customisation using the WordPress customiser, allowing you to completely design a color scheme to suit the needs of your website and preview it on the fly. It’s incredible how quick and simple it is. [button colour="black" type="slightlyroundedarrow" size="small" link="http://" target="_self"]Learn more[/button] [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text title="Fully Responsive" pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3"] [icon image="resize-small" size="medium" cont="no" float="left"]Like any decent theme, Pinpoint is completely responsive. And when we say responsive, we mean it won’t only work on mobile & tablet devices; it’ll look good too! So you’ll never have to worry about what device your clients or customers are using. [button colour="black" type="slightlyroundedarrow" size="small" link="http://" target="_self"]Learn more[/button] [/vc_column_text] [vc_column_text title="400+ Google Fonts" pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/3" el_position="last"] [icon image="font" size="medium" cont="no" float="left"]Pinpoint features 600+ Google Web Fonts, all selectable from the Theme Options panel. You can select different fonts for the body, and headings, or use the standard fonts provided such as Arial and Helvetica. [button colour="black" type="slightlyroundedarrow" size="small" link="http://" target="_self"]Learn more[/button] [/vc_column_text] [blank_spacer height="25px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [divider type="thin" text="Go to top" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="9px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [portfolio title="Recent Projects" portfolio_type="default" display_type="standard" columns="3" show_title="yes" show_client="yes" show_excerpt="yes" excerpt_length="16" item_count="3" category="all" pagination="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [divider type="thin" text="Go to top" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [blank_spacer height="9px" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] [clients title="Our Clients" item_count="4" category="all" pagination="no" width="1/3" el_position="first"] [vc_accordion widget_title="About Us" type="minimal" width="1/3"] [vc_accordion_tab title="Mission Statement"] [vc_column_text pb_margin_bottom="no" pb_border_bottom="no" width="1/1" el_position="first last"] Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
